snippet: Matt Harvey’s strikeout Wednesday against the Nationals marked the first plate appearance this spring by a member of the Mets’ pitching staff, which hit .155 last season.
abstract: New York Mets pitcher Matt Harvey strikes out in team's 8-5 loss to Washington Nationals, first plate appearance by member of team's pitching staff this spring; Mets coaches expect pitchers to lend hand with team's weak offense.
lead_paragraph: Matt Harvey’s strikeout Wednesday against the Nationals marked the first plate appearance this spring by a member of the Mets’ pitching staff, which hit .155 last season.

headline.seo: Mets Expect Pitchers to Help Themselves at the Plate
headline.main: Mets Expect Pitchers to Help Themselves at the Plate
headline.print_headline: Mets Expect Pitchers to Help Themselves at the Plate
